data.comment: The first-half is under way at Jan Breydel Stadium - St. Truidense kick-off to start the match.
Ko Matsubara (St. Truidense) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 18, Santiago Colombatto (St. Truidense) has received a yellow card from Wesli De Cremer.
Dino Hotic scores to make it 1-0 at Jan Breydel Stadium.
In the minute 31, Cercle Brugge have been given a penalty at Jan Breydel Stadium...
Ike Ugbo smashes in a penalty at Jan Breydel Stadium. The score is now 2-0.
Chris Durkin is booked for the away team.
The first half has been concluded at Jan Breydel Stadium.
In the minute 46, The ref has blown to start the second-half. Cercle Brugge kick-off.
The away team replace Wolke Janssens with Ibrahima Sory Sankhon.
Paul Clement is making the team's first substitution at Jan Breydel Stadium with Johanna Omolo replacing Franck Kanoute.
In the minute 68, Cercle Brugge's Johanna Omolo has been booked in Bruges.
Kevin Muscat (St. Truidense) is making a second substitution, with Tatsuya Ito replacing Facundo Colidio.
The home team have replaced Anthony Musaba with Charles Vanhoutte. This is the second substitution made today by Paul Clement.
In the minute 81, Nelson Balongo is replacing Samuel Asamoah for the away team.
Vitinho is on a sub for Dino Hotic for Cercle Brugge.
The match is over. Final score 3-0.
Goal! Vitinho extends Cercle Brugge's lead to 3-0.
